function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete reporting of subnational cases in Iran from 2 to 3 March 2020","Impact":"Difficulty in assessing the impact of national policies due to data gap","Mitigation":"Implement robust and consistent reporting mechanisms at the subnational level","Technologies":"Data management systems, digital reporting platforms","People":"Public health authorities, data analysts","Owner":"Government health departments"},{"Description":"Reliance on multiple sources for policy data in the United States","Impact":"Difficulty in ensuring the accuracy and comprehensiveness of policy data","Mitigation":"Establish a centralized and standardized data collection system for policy responses","Technologies":"Data integration software, government database systems","People":"Government officials, data analysts","Owner":"National public health agencies"},{"Description":"Limited update of confirmed cases by region on the public health website of France until 25 March","Impact":"Incomplete and outdated epidemiological data for analysis","Mitigation":"Ensure real-time and comprehensive reporting of confirmed cases at the regional level","Technologies":"Real-time data tracking systems, automated reporting tools","People":"Public health authorities, data analysts","Owner":"Regional health departments"}]}
